specialties.name: Gourmet Deluxe
specialties.description: Premium selection of artisanal dishes crafted with the finest ingredients. Perfect for special occasions and intimate gatherings.

specialties.name: Fusion Experience
specialties.description: Innovative blend of Eastern and Western cuisines that creates a unique culinary journey. Features bold flavors and creative presentations.

specialties.name: Traditional Heritage
specialties.description: Authentic recipes passed down through generations, featuring time-honored cooking techniques and classic flavors.

specialties.name: Healthy Wellness
specialties.description: Nutritionally balanced meals designed for health-conscious diners. Features organic ingredients and superfood additions.

specialties.name: Chef's Signature
specialties.description: Exclusive creations by our head chef, featuring seasonal ingredients and innovative cooking techniques.

specialties.name: Comfort Classics
specialties.description: Hearty, soul-warming dishes that bring back childhood memories. Perfect for cozy gatherings and family meals.
